verses.name: 1 Samuel 4:15
verses.text: Now Eli was ninety and eight years old; and his eyes were dim, that he could not see.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 4:16
verses.text: And the man said unto Eli, I am he that came out of the army, and I fled to day out of the army. And he said, What is there done, my son?

verses.name: 1 Samuel 4:17
verses.text: And the messenger answered and said, Israel is fled before the Philistines, and there hath been also a great slaughter among the people, and thy two sons also, Hophni and Phinehas, are dead, and the ark of God is taken.
